page.title: 20Cubs,Scouts,Brownies,Guides
page.content:
Both Barby and Kilsby have their Cub, Scout, Guide and Brownie packs. The Scouts in Kilsby are a very active group who take the children away often. The Cubs meet in the school and are well supported.
The Kilsby Guides meet every Wednesday. Mrs. Wilton is Captain and Mrs.Blackwell and Mrs.Probert help. They go on camps, swim and have cook-outs.
Barby Cubs meet on Tuesdays at 6.15. Barby Cubs like to use Youth hostels for their visits.
The Guide Uniform is a navy blue skirt, blue blouse, Red Neckerchief and a blue beret.
